instructions.1: In a jar, combine rolled oats, grated carrot, almond milk, raisins, maple syrup, cinnamon, nutmeg, vanilla extract, chia seeds, and a pinch of salt.
instructions.2: Mix well, cover, and refrigerate overnight.
instructions.3: In the morning, stir the mixture and serve chilled.
instructions.4: Optionally, top with extra raisins or a sprinkle of cinnamon.

blueberry_banana_protein_smoothie.title: Blueberry Banana Protein Smoothie
blueberry_banana_protein_smoothie.info: A refreshing and filling smoothie blending banana, blueberries, and vegan protein powder with almond milk‚Äîa perfect high-protein breakfast option.

instructions.1: Combine banana, frozen blueberries, vegan protein powder, almond milk, and cinnamon in a blender.
instructions.2: Blend until smooth and creamy.
instructions.3: Pour into a glass and serve immediately.

cinnamon_pear_granola_parfait.title: Cinnamon Pear Granola Parfait
cinnamon_pear_granola_parfait.info: A layered breakfast parfait featuring gluten-free granola, diced pear, and dairy-free coconut yogurt with a hint of cinnamon‚Äîa delightful sweet start to the day.

instructions.1: In a serving glass, layer half of the coconut yogurt.
instructions.2: Add a layer of diced pear and a sprinkle of gluten-free granola.
instructions.3: Repeat layers and drizzle with maple syrup and a pinch of cinnamon on top.
instructions.4: Serve immediately.

vegan_berry_almond_oats.title: Vegan Berry Almond Overnight Oats
vegan_berry_almond_oats.info: A nutrient-packed, creamy overnight oats recipe featuring rolled oats, almond milk, almond butter, and mixed berries‚Äîa perfect sweet breakfast option.

instructions.1: Combine rolled oats, almond milk, almond butter, chia seeds, maple syrup, vanilla extract, and a pinch of salt in a jar.
instructions.2: Mix well, cover, and refrigerate overnight.
instructions.3: In the morning, stir the oats and top with mixed berries before serving.

mediterranean_chickpea_wrap.title: Mediterranean Chickpea Salad Wrap
mediterranean_chickpea_wrap.info: A refreshing lunch wrap filled with seasoned chickpeas, diced cucumber, tomato, red onion, and parsley, drizzled with lemon juice and olive oil.

instructions.1: In a bowl, mix chickpeas, cucumber, tomato, red onion, and parsley.
instructions.2: Drizzle with lemon juice and olive oil; season with salt and pepper.
instructions.3: Fill the gluten-free tortilla with the mixture, roll tightly, and serve immediately.

herbed_lemon_garlic_salmon_quinoa.title: Herbed Lemon Garlic Salmon with Quinoa
herbed_lemon_garlic_salmon_quinoa.info: A light and satisfying dinner featuring grilled salmon seasoned with lemon, garlic, and fresh dill, served over a bed of fluffy quinoa and steamed broccoli.

instructions.1: Marinate the salmon with lemon juice, olive oil, chopped dill, salt, and pepper for 15 minutes.
instructions.2: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat and grill the salmon for 7-8 minutes per side until cooked through.
instructions.3: Serve the grilled salmon over cooked quinoa with a side of steamed broccoli.
instructions.4: Garnish with additional dill and a wedge of lemon, if desired.

spicy_roasted_chickpeas.title: Spicy Roasted Chickpeas
spicy_roasted_chickpeas.info: Crunchy and flavorful roasted chickpeas tossed with a blend of chili powder, cumin, and paprika‚Äîa healthy, protein-rich snack.

instructions.1: Preheat the oven to 200¬∞C (400¬∞F).
instructions.2: Toss chickpeas with olive oil, chili powder, cumin, paprika, salt, and pepper.
instructions.3: Spread evenly on a baking sheet and roast for 20-25 minutes until crispy, stirring halfway through.
instructions.4: Let cool slightly and serve as a crunchy snack.

egg_white_spinach_avocado_toast.title: Egg White Spinach Avocado Toast
egg_white_spinach_avocado_toast.info: A protein-packed breakfast toast featuring lightly scrambled egg whites with spinach and mashed avocado on toasted gluten-free bread, garnished with cherry tomatoes.

instructions.1: Toast the gluten-free bread until golden.
instructions.2: In a non-stick pan, heat olive oil and gently scramble egg whites with spinach until just set.
instructions.3: Mash the avocado in a small bowl with a pinch of salt and pepper.
instructions.4: Spread the mashed avocado on the toasted bread, top with the scrambled egg whites and spinach, and garnish with cherry tomatoes.
instructions.5: Serve immediately.

turkey_quinoa_stuffed_zucchini_boats.title: Turkey & Quinoa Stuffed Zucchini Boats
turkey_quinoa_stuffed_zucchini_boats.info: A protein-rich dinner featuring zucchini boats filled with lean turkey, quinoa, diced tomatoes, and fresh basil, baked to perfection.

instructions.1: Preheat the oven to 190¬∞C (375¬∞F).
instructions.2: Slice zucchinis in half lengthwise and scoop out some of the center to form boats.
instructions.3: In a pan, heat olive oil and saut√© chopped onion and garlic until soft; add turkey mince and cook until browned.
instructions.4: Mix in cooked quinoa, diced tomatoes, and basil; season with salt and pepper.
instructions.5: Fill the zucchini boats with the mixture and place on a baking tray.
instructions.6: Bake for 20-25 minutes until zucchini is tender and the filling is heated through.

vegan_coconut_mango_smoothie.title: Vegan Coconut Mango Smoothie
vegan_coconut_mango_smoothie.info: A tropical, refreshing smoothie blending ripe mango with light coconut milk and lime juice‚Äîa quick, energizing breakfast or snack.

instructions.1: Combine diced mango, coconut milk, lime juice, and ice cubes in a blender.
instructions.2: Blend until smooth.
instructions.3: Pour into a glass, garnish with mint leaves, and drizzle maple syrup if desired.
instructions.4: Serve immediately.

vegan_chia_apple_porridge.title: Vegan Chia Apple Porridge
vegan_chia_apple_porridge.info: A hearty breakfast porridge with rolled oats, chia seeds, diced apple, and cinnamon, served warm for a nourishing start to the day.

instructions.1: Combine rolled oats, chia seeds, almond milk, diced apple, cinnamon, maple syrup, and a pinch of salt in a saucepan.
instructions.2: Bring to a simmer over medium heat, stirring frequently, until the oats soften and the mixture thickens (about 8-10 minutes).
instructions.3: Serve warm, optionally topped with extra apple or a sprinkle of cinnamon.

mediterranean_grilled_chicken_salad.title: Mediterranean Grilled Chicken Salad
mediterranean_grilled_chicken_salad.info: A protein-packed lunch salad with grilled chicken, mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and Kalamata olives tossed in a lemon-oregano dressing.

instructions.1: In a large bowl, combine mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, olives, and red onion.
instructions.2: Drizzle with lemon juice, olive oil, and sprinkle dried oregano, salt, and pepper.
instructions.3: Top with sliced grilled chicken, toss lightly, and serve immediately.

spicy_black_bean_quinoa_bowl.title: Spicy Black Bean Quinoa Bowl
spicy_black_bean_quinoa_bowl.info: A hearty, vegan dinner bowl with black beans, quinoa, roasted red bell peppers, corn, and diced red onion, tossed in a smoky chipotle dressing.

vegan_matcha_pancakes.title: Vegan Matcha Pancakes
vegan_matcha_pancakes.info: Fluffy, vibrant vegan pancakes infused with matcha green tea powder and mashed banana, perfect for a bright and healthy breakfast.

instructions.1: In a bowl, whisk together the gluten-free flour, matcha powder, baking powder, and a pinch of salt.
instructions.2: Stir in mashed banana and almond milk until the batter is smooth.
instructions.3: Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat and pour small portions of the batter to form pancakes.
instructions.4: Cook each pancake for 2-3 minutes per side until golden brown.
instructions.5: Serve warm with a drizzle of maple syrup.

avocado_chickpea_salad_sandwich.title: Avocado Chickpea Salad Sandwich
avocado_chickpea_salad_sandwich.info: A hearty vegan sandwich with creamy mashed chickpeas and avocado, mixed with diced celery, red onion, and lemon juice on gluten-free bread.

instructions.1: In a bowl, mash the chickpeas roughly with a fork.
instructions.2: Add the diced avocado, celery, red onion, lemon juice, and chopped parsley.
instructions.3: Mix well and season with salt and pepper.
instructions.4: Spread the mixture onto two slices of gluten-free bread and assemble the sandwich.
instructions.5: Serve immediately.

herb_crusted_salmon_roasted_veggies.title: Herb-Crusted Salmon with Roasted Veggies
herb_crusted_salmon_roasted_veggies.info: A nutritious dinner featuring a salmon fillet with a fresh herb crust served alongside roasted broccoli, carrots, and bell peppers.

instructions.1: Preheat the oven to 200¬∞C (400¬∞F).
instructions.2: Combine dill, parsley, lemon zest, and olive oil in a small bowl.
instructions.3: Brush the salmon fillet with the herb mixture; season with salt and pepper.
instructions.4: Toss broccoli, carrot, and red bell pepper in olive oil, salt, and pepper, and spread on a baking sheet.
instructions.5: Bake the salmon and vegetables for 15-18 minutes until salmon is cooked through and veggies are tender.
instructions.6: Plate the salmon over the roasted vegetables and serve immediately.

vegan_chia_pumpkin_muffins.title: Vegan Chia-Pumpkin Muffins
vegan_chia_pumpkin_muffins.info: Moist, spiced muffins made with pumpkin puree, rolled oats, chia seeds, and maple syrup‚Äîperfect as a healthy breakfast or snack.

instructions.1: Preheat the oven to 180¬∞C (350¬∞F).
instructions.2: Mix the rolled oats, baking powder, cinnamon, nutmeg, and salt in a bowl.
instructions.3: Add the pumpkin puree, almond milk, and maple syrup; stir until the batter is smooth.
instructions.4: Spoon the batter into a lined muffin tin.
instructions.5: Bake for 20-25 minutes until golden and set.
instructions.6: Cool before serving.

spicy_thai_chicken_rice_bowl.title: Spicy Thai Chicken Rice Bowl
spicy_thai_chicken_rice_bowl.info: A flavorful bowl featuring Thai-spiced grilled chicken served over jasmine rice with crisp vegetables and a zesty dressing.

instructions.1: Marinate the chicken slices with Thai chili sauce, lime juice, salt, and pepper for 15 minutes.
instructions.2: Grill the chicken over medium-high heat for 7-8 minutes per side until cooked through.
instructions.3: In a bowl, combine the cooked jasmine rice with julienned carrot, diced cucumber, and sliced red bell pepper.
instructions.4: Top with the grilled chicken and sprinkle with chopped cilantro.
instructions.5: Drizzle extra lime juice and olive oil if desired, then serve immediately.

herb_roasted_cod_sweet_potato_mash.title: Herb-Roasted Cod with Sweet Potato Mash
herb_roasted_cod_sweet_potato_mash.info: A nutritious dinner featuring grilled cod seasoned with fresh herbs, served with a creamy sweet potato mash and steamed green beans.

instructions.1: Preheat the oven to 190¬∞C (375¬∞F).
instructions.2: Toss sweet potato cubes with olive oil, salt, and pepper, then roast for 25-30 minutes until tender.
instructions.3: Season the cod fillet with rosemary, thyme, salt, and pepper.
instructions.4: Grill or bake the cod for 12-15 minutes until cooked through and flaky.
instructions.5: Mash the roasted sweet potatoes until smooth, and serve the cod on a bed of sweet potato mash with steamed green beans on the side.

matcha_coconut_overnight_oats.title: Matcha Coconut Overnight Oats
matcha_coconut_overnight_oats.info: A vibrant twist on classic overnight oats, infused with matcha powder and blended with unsweetened coconut milk for a tropical, energizing breakfast.

instructions.1: In a jar or bowl, combine rolled oats, coconut milk, matcha powder, chia seeds, vanilla extract, maple syrup (if using), and a pinch of salt.
instructions.2: Mix thoroughly, cover, and refrigerate overnight.
instructions.3: Stir in the morning and serve chilled. Optionally, top with fresh berries or sliced banana.

roasted_red_pepper_chickpea_buddha_bowl.title: Roasted Red Pepper & Chickpea Buddha Bowl
roasted_red_pepper_chickpea_buddha_bowl.info: A satisfying vegan bowl featuring roasted red bell peppers, hearty chickpeas, quinoa, crisp cucumber, and fresh arugula drizzled with a tangy tahini-lemon dressing.

instructions.1: In a bowl, combine diced roasted red bell pepper, chickpeas, cooked quinoa, diced cucumber, and arugula.
instructions.2: In a small bowl, whisk together tahini, lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
instructions.3: Drizzle the dressing over the bowl and toss gently until well combined.
instructions.4: Serve immediately.

lemon_garlic_shrimp_zoodles.title: Lemon Garlic Shrimp Zoodles
lemon_garlic_shrimp_zoodles.info: A light and zesty dinner featuring succulent shrimp saut√©ed with garlic and lemon, served over fresh zucchini noodles and cherry tomatoes.

instructions.1: Heat olive oil in a pan over medium-high heat.
instructions.2: Saut√© minced garlic until fragrant, then add the shrimp and cook until pink and opaque (about 4-5 minutes per side).
instructions.3: Add zucchini noodles and cherry tomatoes; toss gently for 2-3 minutes until just warmed.
instructions.4: Drizzle with lemon juice, season with salt and pepper, and sprinkle chopped basil on top.
instructions.5: Serve immediately.

turmeric_ginger_tofu_scramble.title: Turmeric Ginger Tofu Scramble
turmeric_ginger_tofu_scramble.info: A savory vegan breakfast scramble made with firm tofu, turmeric, ginger, fresh spinach, and diced tomatoes‚Äîperfect for a protein-rich start to the day.

instructions.1: Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat.
instructions.2: Add grated ginger and turmeric powder; stir for 30 seconds.
instructions.3: Add tofu cubes and diced red bell pepper; cook for about 5 minutes until lightly browned.
instructions.4: Stir in diced tomatoes and fresh spinach; cook until the spinach wilts, about 2-3 minutes.
instructions.5: Season with salt and pepper, then serve immediately.

mediterranean_roasted_vegetable_millet_s.title: Mediterranean Roasted Vegetable Millet Salad
mediterranean_roasted_vegetable_millet_s.info: A hearty, gluten-free salad featuring roasted zucchini, eggplant, and red bell pepper mixed with cooked millet and tossed in a lemon-oregano dressing.

instructions.1: Preheat the oven to 200¬∞C (400¬∞F). Toss zucchini, eggplant, and red bell pepper with olive oil, salt, and pepper, and roast for 20-25 minutes until tender.
instructions.2: In a bowl, combine the cooked millet with the roasted vegetables, cherry tomatoes, and red onion.
instructions.3: Drizzle with lemon juice and sprinkle with dried oregano.
instructions.4: Toss gently to combine and serve warm or at room temperature.

grilled_lemon_dill_mackerel_with_wild_ri.title: Grilled Lemon Dill Mackerel with Wild Rice Pilaf
grilled_lemon_dill_mackerel_with_wild_ri.info: A nutritious dinner featuring grilled mackerel fillet seasoned with lemon and dill, served over wild rice pilaf with steamed green beans.

instructions.1: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
instructions.2: Season the mackerel fillet with lemon juice, olive oil, chopped dill, salt, and pepper.
instructions.3: Grill the mackerel for 7-8 minutes per side until cooked through and flaky.
instructions.4: Serve the grilled mackerel over a bed of wild rice pilaf with steamed green beans on the side.
instructions.5: Garnish with additional dill and a lemon wedge, if desired.

Peach_Ginger_Overnight_Oats.title: Peach Ginger Overnight Oats
Peach_Ginger_Overnight_Oats.info: A refreshing overnight oats recipe with diced fresh peach and a hint of grated ginger, perfect for a warm, satisfying breakfast.

instructions.1: Combine rolled oats, almond milk, diced peach, grated ginger, chia seeds, maple syrup, cinnamon, and a pinch of salt in a jar.
instructions.2: Mix thoroughly, cover, and refrigerate overnight.
instructions.3: Stir the mixture in the morning and serve chilled, optionally topped with extra peach slices.

Vegan_Falafel_Pita_Wrap.title: Vegan Falafel Pita Wrap
Vegan_Falafel_Pita_Wrap.info: A hearty vegan wrap filled with homemade falafel made from chickpeas, fresh herbs, and spices, wrapped in a gluten-free pita with mixed greens and drizzled with tahini sauce.

instructions.1: In a food processor, blend chickpeas, parsley, cilantro, onion, garlic, cumin, coriander, gluten-free flour, salt, and pepper until well combined but still slightly chunky.
instructions.2: Form the mixture into small patties and lightly pan-fry them in a little oil until golden brown on both sides.
instructions.3: Fill the gluten-free pita with the falafel patties, add mixed greens, and drizzle with tahini sauce.
instructions.4: Serve immediately.

Red_Lentil_Curry_with_Spinach.title: Red Lentil Curry with Spinach
Red_Lentil_Curry_with_Spinach.info: A hearty vegan curry featuring red lentils simmered with diced tomatoes, aromatic spices, and fresh spinach, served over brown rice.

instructions.1: Heat olive oil in a pot and saut√© the chopped onion, garlic, and grated ginger until soft.
instructions.2: Add red lentils, diced tomatoes, vegetable broth, and curry powder; bring to a simmer.
instructions.3: Cook for 25-30 minutes until the lentils are tender.
instructions.4: Stir in fresh spinach until wilted; season with salt and pepper.
instructions.5: Serve hot over cooked brown rice.

chia_pomegranate_overnight_oats.title: Chia Pomegranate Overnight Oats
chia_pomegranate_overnight_oats.info: A refreshing and nutrient-rich breakfast featuring rolled oats soaked overnight with almond milk, chia seeds, and pomegranate juice, topped with pomegranate arils for a burst of tangy sweetness.

instructions.1: In a jar or bowl, combine rolled oats, almond milk, chia seeds, pomegranate juice, maple syrup, vanilla extract, and a pinch of salt.
instructions.2: Mix thoroughly, cover, and refrigerate overnight.
instructions.3: In the morning, stir well and top with pomegranate arils before serving.

asian_quinoa_salad.title: Asian Quinoa Salad with Edamame
asian_quinoa_salad.info: A protein-rich vegan salad featuring cooked quinoa, edamame, shredded carrots, red cabbage, and cucumber tossed in a tangy sesame-ginger dressing.

instructions.1: In a large bowl, combine cooked quinoa, edamame, shredded carrot, red cabbage, diced cucumber, and chopped green onion.
instructions.2: In a small bowl, whisk together sesame oil, rice vinegar, gluten-free soy sauce, salt, and pepper.
instructions.3: Pour the dressing over the salad and toss gently.
instructions.4: Sprinkle sesame seeds on top and serve immediately.

moroccan_lamb_stew.title: Moroccan Lamb Stew
moroccan_lamb_stew.info: A rich and aromatic stew featuring lean lamb cubes simmered with tomatoes, carrots, and spices, garnished with fresh cilantro‚Äîideal for a warming dinner.

instructions.1: Heat olive oil in a pot and saut√© chopped onion, garlic, and diced carrot until softened.
instructions.2: Add lamb cubes and brown on all sides.
instructions.3: Stir in diced tomatoes, eggplant, cumin, cinnamon, and paprika; season with salt and pepper.
instructions.4: Add enough water or lamb broth to just cover the ingredients, bring to a simmer, and cook for 35-40 minutes until the lamb is tender.
instructions.5: Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve hot.

Tropical_Avocado_Mango_Smoothie_Bowl.title: Tropical Avocado Mango Smoothie Bowl
Tropical_Avocado_Mango_Smoothie_Bowl.info: A refreshing breakfast bowl combining ripe mango, creamy avocado, and unsweetened coconut milk, topped with gluten-free granola for a tropical start to your day.

instructions.1: Blend the diced mango, avocado, and coconut milk until smooth.
instructions.2: Pour the mixture into a bowl.
instructions.3: Top with gluten-free granola and drizzle with lime juice (and maple syrup, if using).
instructions.4: Serve immediately.

Moroccan_Spiced_Vegetable_Tagine.title: Moroccan Spiced Vegetable Tagine
Moroccan_Spiced_Vegetable_Tagine.info: A hearty vegan tagine featuring carrots, zucchini, tomatoes, and chickpeas simmered with Moroccan spices, served over quinoa.

instructions.1: Heat olive oil in a pot and saut√© chopped onion and garlic until soft.
instructions.2: Add sliced carrots and zucchini; cook for 5 minutes.
instructions.3: Stir in diced tomatoes, chickpeas, cumin, cinnamon, and paprika.
instructions.4: Simmer for 25-30 minutes until vegetables are tender and flavors meld.
instructions.5: Serve hot over cooked quinoa.

Sweet_Potato_Black_Bean_Quesadilla.title: Sweet Potato Black Bean Quesadilla
Sweet_Potato_Black_Bean_Quesadilla.info: A hearty vegetarian quesadilla made with mashed sweet potato, black beans, and avocado, served in a gluten-free tortilla and accompanied by salsa.

instructions.1: Spread mashed sweet potato evenly over the gluten-free tortilla.
instructions.2: Top with black beans, avocado slices, diced tomato, and fresh spinach.
instructions.3: Fold the tortilla in half and toast in a non-stick pan with a little olive oil until crispy on both sides.
instructions.4: Cut into wedges and serve with salsa on the side.

avocado_cacao_smoothie_bowl.title: Avocado Cacao Smoothie Bowl
avocado_cacao_smoothie_bowl.info: A rich and creamy breakfast bowl blending avocado, banana, cocoa powder, and unsweetened almond milk, topped with sliced strawberries and chia seeds for a satisfying, chocolatey start to your day.

instructions.1: Blend the mashed avocado, banana, almond milk, cocoa powder, and maple syrup until smooth.
instructions.2: Pour the smoothie into a bowl.
instructions.3: Top with sliced strawberries and sprinkle chia seeds over the top.
instructions.4: Serve immediately.

mediterranean_roasted_red_pepper_feta_sa.title: Mediterranean Roasted Red Pepper & Feta Salad
mediterranean_roasted_red_pepper_feta_sa.info: A vibrant salad combining roasted red bell peppers, diced cucumber, cherry tomatoes, red onion, and crumbled feta cheese tossed in a zesty lemon-oregano dressing.

instructions.1: In a large bowl, combine roasted red bell peppers, diced cucumber, cherry tomatoes, red onion, feta cheese, and sliced olives.
instructions.2: Whisk together lemon juice, olive oil, dried oregano, salt, and pepper.
instructions.3: Drizzle the dressing over the salad and toss gently until well combined.
instructions.4: Serve chilled.

ginger_soy_glazed_salmon.title: Ginger Soy Glazed Salmon
ginger_soy_glazed_salmon.info: A delicious dinner dish featuring salmon glazed in a tangy ginger-soy sauce, served over brown rice with steamed broccoli.

instructions.1: Marinate the salmon fillet in grated ginger, minced garlic, soy sauce, lime juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper for 15 minutes.
instructions.2: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat and grill the salmon for 7-8 minutes on each side until cooked through and flaky.
instructions.3: Serve the grilled salmon over a bed of brown rice with steamed broccoli on the side.
instructions.4: Garnish with an extra squeeze of lime juice if desired.

vegan_maple_pecan_overnight_oats.title: Vegan Maple Pecan Overnight Oats
vegan_maple_pecan_overnight_oats.info: A creamy, nutrient-packed overnight oats recipe made with rolled oats, unsweetened almond milk, maple syrup, and chopped pecans for a hearty breakfast. (Note: Contains pecans.)

instructions.1: In a jar, combine rolled oats, almond milk, maple syrup, chia seeds, vanilla extract, and a pinch of salt.
instructions.2: Mix well, cover, and refrigerate overnight.
instructions.3: In the morning, stir and top with extra chopped pecans if desired. Serve chilled.

spicy_mediterranean_hummus_wrap.title: Spicy Mediterranean Hummus Wrap
spicy_mediterranean_hummus_wrap.info: A flavorful vegan lunch wrap filled with homemade hummus, roasted red bell peppers, diced cucumber, and crisp lettuce, all drizzled with a spicy harissa-lime dressing.

instructions.1: In a bowl, combine hummus, harissa sauce, and lime juice; mix well.
instructions.2: Lay out the gluten-free tortilla and spread the hummus mixture evenly.
instructions.3: Add roasted red bell pepper, diced cucumber, and lettuce on top.
instructions.4: Roll the tortilla tightly, slice in half, and serve immediately.

lemon_garlic_chicken_cauliflower_rice.title: Lemon Garlic Chicken with Cauliflower Rice
lemon_garlic_chicken_cauliflower_rice.info: A healthy dinner featuring grilled chicken breast seasoned with lemon and garlic, served over cauliflower rice with a side of steamed green beans.

instructions.1: Marinate the chicken breast in lemon juice, minced garlic, olive oil, salt, and pepper for 15 minutes.
instructions.2: Grill the chicken breast over medium-high heat for 7-8 minutes per side until cooked through.
instructions.3: Prepare cauliflower rice by grating fresh cauliflower and lightly saut√©ing it in a non-stick pan for 3-4 minutes.
instructions.4: Steam the green beans until tender.
instructions.5: Serve the grilled chicken over cauliflower rice with green beans on the side.
instructions.6: Garnish with an extra squeeze of lemon juice if desired.

crispy_roasted_kale_chips.title: Crispy Roasted Kale Chips
crispy_roasted_kale_chips.info: Crunchy and nutrient-dense kale chips baked with olive oil, smoked paprika, and salt‚Äîa healthy, low-calorie snack.

instructions.1: Preheat the oven to 175¬∞C (350¬∞F).
instructions.2: Toss kale pieces with olive oil, smoked paprika, and salt until evenly coated.
instructions.3: Spread the kale on a baking sheet in a single layer.
instructions.4: Bake for 10-15 minutes until crisp, checking frequently to prevent burning.
instructions.5: Remove from the oven, let cool, and serve.

banana_oat_energy_bites.title: Banana Oat Energy Bites
banana_oat_energy_bites.info: Chewy energy bites made from mashed banana, rolled oats, almond butter, and cinnamon‚Äîideal for an on-the-go snack.

instructions.1: In a bowl, mash the banana until smooth.
instructions.2: Mix in rolled oats, almond butter, cinnamon, maple syrup (if using), and a pinch of salt until well combined.
instructions.3: Form the mixture into small, bite-sized balls.
instructions.4: Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes before serving.

spiced_roasted_chickpeas.title: Spiced Roasted Chickpeas
spiced_roasted_chickpeas.info: Crunchy roasted chickpeas tossed in a blend of cumin, chili powder, and smoked paprika‚Äîa protein-packed, savory snack.

instructions.1: Preheat the oven to 200¬∞C (400¬∞F).
instructions.2: Toss chickpeas with olive oil, cumin, chili powder, smoked paprika, salt, and pepper until evenly coated.
instructions.3: Spread the chickpeas on a baking sheet in a single layer.
instructions.4: Roast for 25-30 minutes until crispy, stirring halfway through.
instructions.5: Let cool and serve as a crunchy snack.

crispy_cinnamon_apple_chips.title: Crispy Cinnamon Apple Chips
crispy_cinnamon_apple_chips.info: Thinly sliced apples baked with a sprinkle of cinnamon and a drizzle of lemon juice for a naturally sweet, crunchy snack.

instructions.1: Preheat the oven to 120¬∞C (250¬∞F).
instructions.2: Arrange the apple slices in a single layer on a parchment-lined baking sheet.
instructions.3: Drizzle with lemon juice and sprinkle with cinnamon and a pinch of salt.
instructions.4: Bake for 90-120 minutes until the apple slices are crisp.
instructions.5: Remove from the oven, let cool, and serve.

savory_spicy_roasted_edamame.title: Savory Spicy Roasted Edamame
savory_spicy_roasted_edamame.info: Crunchy roasted edamame pods tossed with chili powder and garlic powder‚Äîa high-protein, low-carb snack that‚Äôs bursting with flavor.

instructions.1: Preheat the oven to 200¬∞C (400¬∞F).
instructions.2: Toss the edamame with olive oil, chili powder, garlic powder, and salt until evenly coated.
instructions.3: Spread the edamame on a baking sheet in a single layer.
instructions.4: Roast for 15-20 minutes until crispy, stirring halfway through.
instructions.5: Let cool slightly and serve.

homemade_roasted_seaweed_crisps.title: Homemade Roasted Seaweed Crisps
homemade_roasted_seaweed_crisps.info: Light and crispy seaweed snacks lightly brushed with sesame oil and a dash of rice vinegar‚Äîa nutrient-rich, low-calorie treat.

instructions.1: Preheat the oven to 150¬∞C (300¬∞F).
instructions.2: Lightly brush the nori sheets with sesame oil and a few drops of rice vinegar.
instructions.3: Sprinkle lightly with salt.
instructions.4: Place the seaweed on a baking sheet and bake for 5-7 minutes until crispy.
instructions.5: Remove from the oven, let cool, and serve.
